divs: Sighting DetailsApproximately 9:18 p.m. EST ,I walked outside of my house and turned to the South Western night sky and noticed a very bright orange sphere hovering and then moving a little and then back to hover mode. There was an incoming plane in the spheres direction and as soon as the plane was close to it, it just dissapeared. I took video of it as best I could on my cell phones video. I thought at first it might be a chinese lantern or something but lanterns dont move like that. I thought about contacting the police but then I thought to myself, what if the police show up at my door and arrest me for prank calling the dept. I felt very weirded out by this. I surely hope someone else in the Florida Pinellas and Pasco county area saw this as well.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Holiday
There were no other sightings in Holiday on or around August 4th 2012
Summary: I saw a bright orange sphere hovering for 2 mins until a plane was in its path and it dissapered
